alert.note: Alert for Coastal Del Norte; Mendocino Coast; Northern Humboldt Coast; Southwestern Humboldt (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued April 14 at 10:37PM PDT until April 15 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 expected. * WHERE...Coastal Del Norte, Northern Humboldt Coast, Southwestern Humboldt and Mendocino Coast Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 9 AM PDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Provide adequate shelter for outdoor pets or consider bringing them indoors. Frost Advisories and Freeze Warnings are issued during the local growing season as defined by climatology and local agriculture experts. Once the growing season has ended these statements will no longer be issued until the spring.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Del Norte; Mendocino Coast; Northern Humboldt Coast; Southwestern Humboldt
